Posts.Content: Hi, congratulations on your run!! Well done. You look amazingxxx
Posts.Title: No headscarf

Posts.Content: Hi, I think it's a great attitude you have!! I've worn scarves, don't really feel comfortable in my wig, even though it's nice! Haven't been brave enough to go out bald ((it's only been 2 weeks) until Wednesday I had to go to A&E as have got a blood clot in my arm (picc line) I was in so much pain didn't even think about my lack of hair!!  Did get a few sympathy looks, but now feel more confident to go out locally with my bald head!! We've got nothing to hide!!  My family and friends have said how much I suit it!! Best wishes to everyone who is going through these difficult times xxx
Posts.Title: No headscarf

Posts.Content: Hi all, I was diagnosed with breast cancer 2 1/2 months ago, I've had two ops went well!! Next week I'm starting my chemo, feeling really nervous. Worried about feeling sick, loosing my hair!!! I've got lots of support from family and friends still doesn't stop you feeling your by yourself!!
